trans-unit.source: Provides properties and methods to add a license to a component and to manage a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece propriedades e métodos para adicionar uma licença a um componente e gerenciar uma <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The LicenseManager class provides the following `static` properties: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.UsageMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A classe de LicenseManager fornece os seguintes `static` propriedades: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.UsageMode%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.UsageMode%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The class also provides the following `static` methods: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CreateWithContext%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A classe também fornece o seguinte `static` métodos: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CreateWithContext%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CreateWithContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a component that you want to license, you must do the following: 1.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um componente que você deseja de licença, você deve fazer o seguinte: 1.

trans-unit.source: Specify the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider> by marking the component with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Especifique a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider>marcando o componente com <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> in the constructor of the component.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>no construtor do componente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A> throws a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException> when it tries to create an instance without a valid license.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>gera um <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>quando ele tenta criar uma instância sem uma licença válida.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException></xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>não lançará uma exceção.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A> on any license that is granted when the component is disposed or finalized.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A>em qualquer licença que é concedida quando o componente é descartado ou finalizado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on licensing, see [How to: License Components and Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre licenciamento, consulte [como: controles e componentes de licença](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the specified type, given a context in which you can use the licensed instance.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância do tipo especificado, dado um contexto no qual você pode usar a instância licenciada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext> you specify as the `creationContext` parameter is used as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> for the life of this <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>você especificar como o `creationContext` parâmetro é usado como o <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>durante a vida útil desse <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: The CreateWithContext method blocks all other threads in the <xref:System.AppDomain> from modifying the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>, allowing CreateWithContext to behave as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: O método CreateWithContext bloqueia todos os outros threads <xref:System.AppDomain>modifiquem o <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>, permitindo que CreateWithContext se comporta como uma operação atômica.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> </xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type to create.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Type>que representa o tipo a ser criado.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"></xref> that specifies when you can use the licensed instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"> </xref> que especifica quando você pode usar a instância licenciada.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the specified type with the specified arguments, given a context in which you can use the licensed instance.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância do tipo especificado com os argumentos especificados, recebe um contexto no qual você pode usar a instância licenciada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext> you specify as the `creationContext` parameter is used as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> for the life of this <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>você especificar como o `creationContext` parâmetro é usado como o <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>durante a vida útil desse <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: This method blocks all other threads in the <xref:System.AppDomain> from modifying the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>, allowing <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CreateWithContext%2A> to behave as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: Esse método bloqueia todos os outros threads <xref:System.AppDomain>modifiquem o <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>, permitindo <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CreateWithContext%2A>se comporta como uma operação atômica.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CreateWithContext%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> </xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type to create.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Type>que representa o tipo a ser criado.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"></xref> that specifies when you can use the licensed instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"> </xref> que especifica quando você pode usar a instância licenciada.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Object> that represents the arguments for the type.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref:System.Object>que representa os argumentos para o tipo.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the specified type with the given array of arguments.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do tipo especificado com a matriz de argumentos fornecida.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"></xref>, which specifies when you can use the licensed object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o atual <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"> </xref>, que especifica quando você pode usar o objeto licenciado.

trans-unit.source: When the user requests a valid <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>, the user must give the context in which the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> is valid to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário solicita um válido <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>, o usuário deve fornecer o contexto no qual o <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>é válido para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.License>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext> returned by this property should be passed to all <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider> classes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>retornados por essa propriedade deve ser passada para todos os <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider>classes.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"></xref> that specifies when you can use the licensed object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"> </xref> que especifica quando você pode usar o objeto licenciado.

trans-unit.source: The CurrentContext property is currently locked and cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade CurrentContext está bloqueada e não pode ser alterada.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the given type has a valid license.
trans-unit.target: Retorna se o tipo fornecido tem uma licença válida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to find a valid license for.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>Para localizar um loop for de licença válida</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the given type is licensed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o tipo em questão é licenciado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a valid license can be granted for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Determina se é possível conceder uma licença válida para o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The IsValid method returns `true` when the type is either not licensed, or is licensed and the license is valid.
trans-unit.target: O método IsValid retorna `true` quando o tipo não está licenciado ou é licenciado e a licença é válida.

trans-unit.source: This method does not throw a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException> when it cannot grant a valid <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.
trans-unit.target: Este método não lança um <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>quando ele não é possível conceder <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> válido</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A> method throws exceptions.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>método lança exceções.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of object that requests the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Type>que representa o tipo de objeto que solicita o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a valid license can be granted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se uma licença válida pode ser concedida; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a valid license can be granted for the specified instance of the type.
trans-unit.target: Determina se é possível conceder uma licença válida para a instância especificada do tipo.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a valid <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método cria um válido <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> method returns `true` when the `type` parameter is not licensed, or when it is licensed and the `license` parameter is valid.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>método retorna `true` quando o `type` parâmetro não está licenciado ou quando ele é licenciado e `license` parâmetro é válido.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method does not throw a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException> when it cannot grant a valid <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.
trans-unit.target: Este método não lança um <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>quando ele não é possível conceder <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> válido</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A> method throws exceptions.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>método lança exceções.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the `license` parameter is not `null` after this call, the object asking for a <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> must dispose of the license by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A> method when the object is disposed of or finalized.
trans-unit.target: Se o `license` parâmetro não é `null` após essa chamada, o objeto pedindo um <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>deve descartar a licença chamando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A>método quando o objeto é descartado ou finalizado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.License>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of object that requests the license.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Type>que representa o tipo de objeto que solicita a licença.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An object of the specified type or a type derived from the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto do tipo especificado ou um tipo derivado do tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref> that is a valid license, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a valid license cannot be granted.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref> que é uma licença válida, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se não é possível conceder uma licença válida.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a valid <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref> can be granted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se uma opção válida <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref> pode ser concedido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Prevents changes being made to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"></xref> of the given object.
trans-unit.target: Impede que alterações sejam feitas no atual <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"> </xref> do objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext> to get the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> of an object.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>para obter o <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>de um objeto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: This method locks the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>, preventing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> from being retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Esse método bloqueia o <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>, impedindo assim a <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>sejam recuperadas.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: The object whose current context you want to lock.
trans-unit.target: O objeto cujo contexto atual que você deseja bloquear.

trans-unit.source: The context is already locked.
trans-unit.target: O contexto já está bloqueado.

trans-unit.source: Allows changes to be made to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"></xref> of the given object.
trans-unit.target: Permite que as alterações a serem feitas nos atual <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"> </xref> do objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext> to get the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> of an object.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>para obter o <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>de um objeto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: This method unlocks the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>, allowing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Esse método desbloqueia o <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>, permitindo que o <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>a ser recuperado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext>

trans-unit.source: The object whose current context you want to unlock.
trans-unit.target: O objeto cujo contexto atual que deseja desbloquear.

trans-unit.source: contextUser represents a different user than the one specified in a previous call to .
trans-unit.target: contextUserrepresenta um usuário diferente daquele especificado em uma chamada anterior para .

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode"></xref> which specifies when you can use the licensed object for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode"> </xref> que especifica quando você pode usar o objeto licenciado para <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext*>

trans-unit.source: If this property cannot find a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A> value, it returns <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode>.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade não é possível localizar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>valor, ele retorna <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode"></xref> values, as specified in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext*> property.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseUsageMode"> </xref> valores, conforme especificado no <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext*>propriedade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.CurrentContext*>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a license can be granted for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Determina se é possível conceder uma licença para o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method throws a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException> when a valid <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> cannot be granted.
trans-unit.target: Este método lança um <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>quando válido <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>não pode ser concedida.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> method does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>método gerará uma exceção.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of object that requests the license.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Type>que representa o tipo de objeto que solicita a licença.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref> cannot be granted.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref> não pode ser concedida.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a license can be granted for the instance of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Determina se é possível conceder uma licença para a instância do tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method throws a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException> when a valid <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> cannot be granted.
trans-unit.target: Este método lança um <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>quando válido <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>não pode ser concedida.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A> method does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>método gerará uma exceção.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: All objects asking for a <xref:System.ComponentModel.License> must dispose of the license by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A> method when the object is disposed of or finalized.
trans-unit.target: Todos os objetos pedindo um <xref:System.ComponentModel.License>deve descartar a licença chamando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A>método quando o objeto é descartado ou finalizado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.License>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of object that requests the license.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Type>que representa o tipo de objeto que solicita a licença.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> of the specified type or a type derived from the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>do tipo especificado ou um tipo derivado do tipo especificado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A valid <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The type is licensed, but a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref> cannot be granted.
trans-unit.target: O tipo é licenciado, mas um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref> não pode ser concedida.
